title: Niall Horan sends his new songs to Lewis Capaldi for an honest opinion
text:
Niall Horan has confessed he gets FOMO while watching awards shows and can’t wait to get back to his music career full time.

The former One Direction star, 26, who recently released his new song Nice To Meet Ya, revealed he is loving Lewis Capaldi and Billie Eilish at the moment, but feels like he is missing out on his old life.

He explained: ‘I mean, Capaldi’s killing it now. I’ll be back in the States this week and he’s number four on the Billboard Hot 100 and he’s flying again.

‘Billie Eilish is just the best thing to happen to the music industry in a long time and this is why I’m so excited to get back into it, because I turn on the TV and watch these awards shows and all that and I feel like I’m missing out, like “that used to be me!”.’

Niall also revealed that he sends his new music to his friends in the industry – none other than Lewis and Shawn Mendes – to get their honest opinions on his work.

‘Yeah, I definitely do,’ he told the Capital Evening Show with Jimmy Hill. ‘Other artists, like, me and Shawn always – Shawn Mendes – that was quite a name drop! “Oh me and Shawn! Me and old Mendy”.

Niall revealed he feels like he is missing out when he watches awards shows (Picture: Capital FM)

‘We’ll literally send songs back and forth and if we’re in LA at the same time and we’re in the car going somewhere we’ll just throw it on – one of his, or one of mine. Same with Lewis [Capaldi].

‘Lewis has got a really good ear and obviously I mean, the guy’s got hits coming out of his ears, but he’s got a really similar type thing so I’ll always play them to him. He really likes the new one actually, ‘coz he’s a bit of a scally isn’t he?’

Niall added that Lewis is always good for honest feedback: ‘Yeah, that’s what you want. You don’t want anyone messing around, because you could completely lie to someone but there’s no point in that because I suppose as friends they would have my best interests at heart.’
